dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2922 : To extend the authority of the Supreme Court Police to protect court officials away from the Supreme Court grounds.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To extend the authority of the Supreme Court Police to protect court officials away from the Supreme Court grounds.

section.header: Extension of authority of Supreme Court Police to protect court officials off Supreme Court grounds
section.text: Section 6121(b)(2) of title 40, United States Code, is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2019.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 12, 2013.
